tabs.title: 0: Introduction
tabs.description:
Simple app to visualize the content of a knowledge base in the RDF format - open source [here](https://github.com/MadsHolten/sparql-visualizer).

The frontend of the app is based on [Angular](https://angular.io/), [material design](https://material.angular.io/) and [D3](https://d3js.org/) and the default local triplestore is based on [rdfstore](https://github.com/antoniogarrote/rdfstore-js).
### Resources
*[Documentation](https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/)
